```py
df <- data.frame(
  id = c(1:8),
  value = c(123, 86, 234, 235, 212, 121, 123, 899),
  colC = c("A", "C", "B", "B", "A", "B", "C", "C"),
  colD = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE)
)

df
  id value colC  colD
1  1   123    A  TRUE
2  2    86    C  TRUE
3  3   234    B FALSE
4  4   235    B FALSE
5  5   212    A FALSE
6  6   121    B FALSE
7  7   123    C  TRUE
8  8   899    C FALSE
```

```py
df[with(df, order(value)), ]

  id value colC  colD
2  2    86    C  TRUE
6  6   121    B FALSE
1  1   123    A  TRUE
7  7   123    C  TRUE
5  5   212    A FALSE
3  3   234    B FALSE
4  4   235    B FALSE
8  8   899    C FALSE
```

```py
df[with(df, order(-value)), ]

  id value colC  colD
8  8   899    C FALSE
4  4   235    B FALSE
3  3   234    B FALSE
5  5   212    A FALSE
1  1   123    A  TRUE
7  7   123    C  TRUE
6  6   121    B FALSE
2  2    86    C  TRUE
```

```py
df[with(df, order(-value, id)), ]

  id value colC  colD
8  8   899    C FALSE
4  4   235    B FALSE
3  3   234    B FALSE
5  5   212    A FALSE
1  1   123    A  TRUE
7  7   123    C  TRUE
6  6   121    B FALSE
2  2    86    C  TRUE
```

```py
df[with(df, order(-value, -id)), ]

  id value colC  colD
8  8   899    C FALSE
4  4   235    B FALSE
3  3   234    B FALSE
5  5   212    A FALSE
7  7   123    C  TRUE
1  1   123    A  TRUE
6  6   121    B FALSE
2  2    86    C  TRUE
```

```py
df[with(df, order(-id, -value)), ]

 id value colC  colD
8  8   899    C FALSE
7  7   123    C  TRUE
6  6   121    B FALSE
5  5   212    A FALSE
4  4   235    B FALSE
3  3   234    B FALSE
2  2    86    C  TRUE
1  1   123    A  TRUE
```
